page.title: 10LONGHOPE FETE
page.content: {Longhope fete and horse show}takes place annually on the first Saturday in July. It is held on the{Recreation {Ground.}It is opened by a well-known village personality. First there is a procession of decorated lorries led by the{Longhope Carnival Queen.}There are prizes for the best float and also for fancy dress. After this stalls open for trading, selling cakes, plants, produce ,toys,jumble, ice-cream, hot-dogs,teas and burgers. Other organisations like scouts,guides and brownies run side-shows where the public can win prizes for throwing darts or rolling balls or knocking down coconuts. For children there is a Punch and Judy show and an inflatable castle. There are pony rides too and in the adjoining field competitors can participate in{show-jumping.}
